translation: Defeat the Wizards!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Wizards!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Imps!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Imps!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Sand Ogres!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Sand Ogres!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Defeat the Centaur!{#Name="説明文"}
source: Defeat the Centaur!{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Reveal the truth of it all.{#Name="説明文"}
source: Reveal the truth of it all.{#Name="説明文"}

translation: Well, well. Glad to see you're finally interested in hearing me out.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Well, well. Glad to see you're finally interested in hearing me out.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Yeah.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Though, you could sound a bit more thankful, at least...{#Name="Accord"}
source: Though, you could sound a bit more thankful, at least...{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Just start talking before I tear you apart.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Just start talking before I tear you apart.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Oooh, scary!{#Name="Accord"}
source: Oooh, scary!{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Fine, fine. Listen up.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Fine, fine. Listen up.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: For starters, let's talk about your sisters, shall we?{#Name="Accord"}
source: For starters, let's talk about your sisters, shall we?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: You know? The accursed sisters that you're destined to fight?{#Name="Accord"}
source: You know? The accursed sisters that you're destined to fight?{#Name="Accord"}

translation: Then we should talk about how much time you've got left.{#Name="Accord"}
source: Then we should talk about how much time you've got left.{#Name="Accord"}

translation: August the 21st, 998 A.D.{#Name=" "}
source: August the 21st, 998 A.D.{#Name=" "}

translation: The first time I saw this flower...{#Name="Zero"}
source: The first time I saw this flower...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: was the day I died.{#Name="Zero"}
source: was the day I died.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Now I'm just a corpse being kept{LF}alive by the flower's magic.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Now I'm just a corpse being kept{LF}alive by the flower's magic.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...A corpse.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...A corpse.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My brain, my heart, my body—{#Name="Zero"}
source: My brain, my heart, my body—{#Name="Zero"}

translation: it's all being kept in motion by the flower.{#Name="Zero"}
source: it's all being kept in motion by the flower.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I'm no longer alive in any real sense of the word.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I'm no longer alive in any real sense of the word.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: This flower is a calamity that{LF}threatens the entire world.{#Name="Zero"}
source: This flower is a calamity that{LF}threatens the entire world.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: It's growing. Feeding off me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: It's growing. Feeding off me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Eventually, it's going to consume me entirely,{#Name="Zero"}
source: Eventually, it's going to consume me entirely,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: and once that happens? Once it's fully grown?{#Name="Zero"}
source: and once that happens? Once it's fully grown?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...It's going to destroy everything.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...It's going to destroy everything.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Heh. Pretty shit deal, huh?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh. Pretty shit deal, huh?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: When I realized I was infected by a flower{LF}that was going to end the world...{#Name="Zero"}
source: When I realized I was infected by a flower{LF}that was going to end the world...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I tried to kill myself.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I tried to kill myself.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Well, technically I was already dead, but...yeah. {#Name="Zero"}
source: Well, technically I was already dead, but...yeah. {#Name="Zero"}

translation: Anyway...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Anyway...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I tried to rip the damn thing out, but...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I tried to rip the damn thing out, but...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: in the end, that just made things worse.{#Name="Zero"}
source: in the end, that just made things worse.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The flower freaked out.{LF}Started sprouting these...children.{#Name="Zero"}
source: The flower freaked out.{LF}Started sprouting these...children.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Five little girls, one after the other.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Five little girls, one after the other.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: They burst out of me and ran{LF}off before I could blink.{#Name="Zero"}
source: They burst out of me and ran{LF}off before I could blink.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Basically...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Basically...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: To prevent me from killing it,{LF}the flower made copies of me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: To prevent me from killing it,{LF}the flower made copies of me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And that's how I ended up with my sisters.{#Name="Zero"}
source: And that's how I ended up with my sisters.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Course, these "children" aren't{LF}any more alive than I am.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Course, these "children" aren't{LF}any more alive than I am.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So now...{#Name="Zero"}
source: So now...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: The eldest corpse is running around{LF}killing all of its little corpse sisters.{#Name="Zero"}
source: The eldest corpse is running around{LF}killing all of its little corpse sisters.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Heh. Insane, isn't it?{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Heh. Insane, isn't it?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: My sisters took everything from me.{#Name="Zero"}
source: My sisters took everything from me.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: They each ran off with a piece of my magic.{#Name="Zero"}
source: They each ran off with a piece of my magic.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Or the flower's magic, I guess.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Or the flower's magic, I guess.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: At first I tried to recapture 'em, but...{#Name="Zero"}
source: At first I tried to recapture 'em, but...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: They had all my power, and I had...nothing.{#Name="Zero"}
source: They had all my power, and I had...nothing.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: But you wanna know the best part?{#Name="Zero"}
source: But you wanna know the best part?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: After a while, my sisters started{LF}fighting for "peace."{#Name="Zero"}
source: After a while, my sisters started{LF}fighting for "peace."{#Name="Zero"}

translation: They come from a flower that's gonna end{LF}the world, and they fight for PEACE?{#Name="Zero"}
source: They come from a flower that's gonna end{LF}the world, and they fight for PEACE?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Hilarious.{#Name="Zero"}
source: ...Hilarious.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Anyway, that's when I made my choice:{#Name="Zero"}
source: Anyway, that's when I made my choice:{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I decided to kill my sisters...{#Name="Zero"}
source: I decided to kill my sisters...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: and then destroy the flower.{#Name="Zero"}
source: and then destroy the flower.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I figured I started this whole mess, ya know?{#Name="Zero"}
source: I figured I started this whole mess, ya know?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I might as well finish it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I might as well finish it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So that's about the long and short of it.{#Name="Zero"}
source: So that's about the long and short of it.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: That's what this whole thing's about.{#Name="Zero"}
source: That's what this whole thing's about.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Michael!{#Name="Zero"}
source: Michael!{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I can hear you. There's no need to shout.{#Name="Michael"}
source: I can hear you. There's no need to shout.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: As I searched for a way to kill my sisters,{#Name="Zero"}
source: As I searched for a way to kill my sisters,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I learned there was only one option.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I learned there was only one option.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: If I wanted to put 'em in the ground for good,{#Name="Zero"}
source: If I wanted to put 'em in the ground for good,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I was going to need a dragon.{#Name="Zero"}
source: I was going to need a dragon.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: See, to break the flower's magic,{#Name="Zero"}
source: See, to break the flower's magic,{#Name="Zero"}

translation: only a dragon, or a weapon made{LF}from a dragon, will do the trick.{#Name="Zero"}
source: only a dragon, or a weapon made{LF}from a dragon, will do the trick.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: So I joined up with Michael,{LF}the strongest dragon of them all.{#Name="Zero"}
source: So I joined up with Michael,{LF}the strongest dragon of them all.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: And the two of us worked together.{#Name="Zero"}
source: And the two of us worked together.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Zero.{#Name="Michael"}
source: Zero.{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Yeah?{#Name="Zero"}
source: Yeah?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Are you certain about this?{#Name="Michael"}
source: Are you certain about this?{#Name="Michael"}

translation: What's wrong, Michael? You scared?{#Name="Zero"}
source: What's wrong, Michael? You scared?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Bah. I fear nothing!{#Name="Michael"}
source: Bah. I fear nothing!{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Heh heh heh.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Heh heh heh.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: A dragon who reneges on his word?{LF}That'd be somethin'.{#Name="Zero"}
source: A dragon who reneges on his word?{LF}That'd be somethin'.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: I would never sully myself so!{#Name="Michael"}
source: I would never sully myself so!{#Name="Michael"}

translation: Then you know what to do.{#Name="Zero"}
source: Then you know what to do.{#Name="Zero"}

translation: Once all my sisters are dead...{#Name="Zero"}
source: Once all my sisters are dead...{#Name="Zero"}

translation: you have to kill me too. Deal?{#Name="Zero"}
source: you have to kill me too. Deal?{#Name="Zero"}

translation: ...Agreed.{#Name="Michael"}
source: ...Agreed.{#Name="Michael"}
